00032 typedef enum _nitf_ConvType
00033 {
00034     NITF_CONV_UINT,
00035     NITF_CONV_INT,
00036     NITF_CONV_REAL,
00037     NITF_CONV_STRING,
00038     NITF_CONV_RAW
00039 } nitf_ConvType;
00040 
00041 #define NITF_MAX_CONV_TYPE NITF_VAL_RAW
00042 
00043 /* define standard lengths to use when converting */
00044 #define NITF_INT8_SZ  1
00045 #define NITF_INT16_SZ 2
00046 #define NITF_INT32_SZ 4
00047 #define NITF_INT64_SZ 8
00048 
00062 typedef enum _nitf_FieldType
00063 {
00064     NITF_BCS_A,                 /* Field is basic character set alphanumeric */
00065     NITF_BCS_N,                 /* Field is basic character set numeric  */
00066     NITF_BINARY                 /* Field is binary data */
00067 } nitf_FieldType;
00068 
00080 typedef struct _nitf_Field
00081 {
00082     nitf_FieldType type;
00083     char *raw;
00084     size_t length;
00085     NITF_BOOL resizable; /* private member that states whether the field
00086                             can be resized - default is false */
00087 }
00088 nitf_Field;

00377 #define NITF_TRY_GET_UINT32(FIELD, DATA_PTR, error)                        \
00378     if (!nitf_Field_get(FIELD, DATA_PTR, NITF_CONV_UINT, NITF_INT32_SZ, error)) \
00379         goto CATCH_ERROR
00380 
00384 #define NITF_TRY_GET_UINT64(FIELD, DATA_PTR, error)        \
00385     if (!nitf_Field_get(FIELD, DATA_PTR, NITF_CONV_UINT,NITF_INT64_SZ, error)) \
00386         goto CATCH_ERROR
